definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]

sentences.english: Infant-care behavior of cotton-top tamarin has a direct effect on infant mortality.
sentences.chinese: 籠養棉頂狨猴的育嬰行爲直接影響嬰猴的存活率。

sentences.english: Studies of the common marmoset, a small Brazilian monkey, may provide some insights .
sentences.chinese: 針對小型巴西狨猴所做的研究，可能提供了一些線索。

sentences.english: Golden lions live primarily in the trees.
sentences.chinese: 金頭獅狨主要生活在樹上。

sentences.english: Marmosets are monogamous, and both parents participate in the care of their offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狨猴行一夫一妻制，且夫妻倆共同照顧幼兒。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The marmosets were died of the infection of sendai virus.
sentences.chinese: 結論狨猴的死亡原因是仙台病毒感染所致。

sentences.english: Laboratory marmosets increased weight at a rate of nine percent per ten-year period.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室狨增加了百分之九十年間率百分之重量。

sentences.english: The researchers found that the capuchins treated the marmoset, who they named Fortunata, just like an infant capuchin.
sentences.chinese: 研究者們把這隻狨猴取名爲“幸運兒”。

definition: legendary ape of Sichuan and Yunnan, with a penchant for carrying off girls
